trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods and fields for initiating drag-and-drop operations, including a method to begin a drag-and-drop operation, and facilities for adding and removing drag-and-drop related event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 提供 helper 方法和欄位啟始拖放作業，包括方法開始拖放作業，並新增和移除拖放相關的事件處理常式的功能。

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop commonly refers to a method of data transfer that involves using a mouse (or some other pointing device) to select one or more objects, dragging these objects over some desired drop target in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], and dropping them.
trans-unit.target: 拖放一般是指涉及使用滑鼠 （或其他一些指標裝置） 選取一或多個物件，這些物件拖曳中一些想要的置放目標的資料傳輸方法[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，並且卸除它們。

trans-unit.source: A drag-and-drop operation is analogous to a copy (or cut)-and-paste operation that is used to transfer data from one object or application to another.
trans-unit.target: 拖放作業相當於複本 （或剪下）-和-貼上用來將資料從一個物件或應用程式之間傳輸的作業。

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop operations typically involve two parties: a drag source from which the dragged data originates and a drop target which receives the dropped data.
trans-unit.target: 拖放作業通常牽涉到兩個合作對象︰ 從拖曳來源被拖曳的資料來源以及在置放目標會接收已卸除的資料。

trans-unit.source: The events and methods required for drag-and-drop operations are defined in the DragDrop class.
trans-unit.target: 拖放類別中定義的事件和拖放作業所需的方法。

trans-unit.source: The drag-and-drop events are attached events that can be attached to any <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 拖放事件都是可附加至任何<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement></xref:System.Windows.UIElement>的附加的事件

trans-unit.source: The drag source and drop target may be UI elements in the same application or in different applications.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳來源和置放目標可能會在相同的應用程式或不同的應用程式的 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: However, the drop target must know how to process the data being passed by the drag source.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在置放目標必須知道如何處理拖曳來源傳遞的資料。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> classes contain aliases for the drag-and-drop events so that the events appear in the class members list when these classes are inherited as a base class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>類別包含拖放事件的別名，讓事件出現在類別成員清單時，這些類別繼承基底類別。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: When you attach an event handler to a drag-and-drop event on one of these classes, the handler is attached to the underlying DragDrop event and they receive the same instance of event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至這些類別的其中一個上拖放事件時，此處理常式附加至基本的拖放事件，而且它們會接收事件資料的相同執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For example, see <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The drag source initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method and passing the transferred data to it.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳來源藉由呼叫靜態<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>方法和傳遞傳送的資料。 請</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>啟始拖放作業

trans-unit.source: An element typically handles the following events when it is a drag source: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> An element typically handles the following events when it is a drop target: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> For more information and examples, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 項目通常會處理下列事件時拖曳來源:- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback>-<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>項目通常會處理下列事件時，它在置放目標:- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver>-<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[拖曳和卸除概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event handler to a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>事件處理常式加入指定相依性物件。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event occurs when an object is dragged into the element's bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>物件拖曳至目的範圍時，就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>事件。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewDragEnterHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewDragEnterHandler%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewDragEnterHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 相依性物件 ( <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>)，以加入事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入的處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event handler to a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件處理常式加入指定相依性物件。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件發生於拖放作業，並可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入處理常式的反昇新版<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>事件。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入的通道的版本，此事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.AddPreviewQueryContinueDragHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object (a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref>) to which to add the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 相依性物件 ( <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref>)，以加入事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.
trans-unit.target: 參考要加入的處理常式方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 啟始拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of your application to determine when a drag occurs, and then initiate the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 負責應用程式，判斷拖曳，就會發生，然後再啟始拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is when a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> sequence of events occurs over the element to be dragged.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是當<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件的順序來拖曳出來，放在元素上方，就會發生。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: You initiate the drag-and-drop operation by calling the static DoDragDrop method and passing the transferred data to it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以起始拖放作業呼叫靜態 DoDragDrop 方法並傳遞給它來傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: The DoDragDrop method will automatically wrap the data in a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> if necessary.
trans-unit.target: DoDragDrop 方法會自動換行中的資料<xref:System.Windows.DataObject>視。</xref:System.Windows.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: For greater control over the data format, you can wrap the data in a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> before passing it to the DoDragDrop method.
trans-unit.target: 為了進一步控制資料格式的詳細資訊，您可以將資料包裝在<xref:System.Windows.DataObject>再將它傳遞至 DoDragDrop 方法。</xref:System.Windows.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the DoDragDrop method is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.Effects%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set in the drop target’s <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 從 DoDragDrop 方法傳回的值是值<xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.Effects%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中拖放目標屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> </xref:System.Windows.DragEventArgs.Effects%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the return value does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to DoDragDrop, the drag-and-drop operation is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的值不符合其中一個`allowedEffects`DoDragDrop 呼叫中指定，拖放作業不會執行。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the dependency object that is the source of the data being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 正在拖曳的資料來源的相依性物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: A data object that contains the data being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 資料物件，其中包含正在拖曳的資料。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref> values that specifies permitted effects of the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref>值，指定允許拖放作業的效果。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref> values that specifies the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref>值，指定拖放作業時執行的最終效果。
